attributes.action: Allow all pets and dss in all rental properties
attributes.additional_details: It would stop the endless rehoming of pets help peoples.mental health and give people a reason. Dss tenants and people with pets deserve thw right to a home too. We are treated with distaste and disrespect because of this and with many Landlords already owning a dog this is unfair.
attributes.background: When renting it is becoming increasingly hard it is almost impossible to find a property which accepts pets and dss tenants this needs to change.
